text.section: The Board shall govern a program.

section.section:
Of the 25 members:
5 shall be appointed by the Governor, with the advice of the State Superintendent and the advice and consent of the Senate; and
20 shall be selected in accordance with the charter and bylaws of the program.
The term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of the members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Board on July 1, 2006.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed or selected and qualifies.
A member may not serve for more than 3 consecutive full terms.
A vacancy shall be filled in the same manner in which the vacating member was appointed or selected.

text.section: The Board shall determine its officers.
